intent: Calling an external command
rewritten_intent: Calling an external command "ls"
snippet:
p = subprocess.Popen('ls', shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT)
for line in p.stdout.readlines():
    print(line, end=' ')
retval = p.wait()
